page.shortlink: ux map properties google maps api key
page.description: Specifies you Google Maps API Key. You need to go to the Google Maps site to request you API key. The key you define here will override the project global API key that you can define in the Web Project Properties dialog.

section.tip: If you wish to use the key defined in Project Properties leave this value blank

step.description: If you already have a Google Maps API key then you should go to the Project Properties menu in the Web Projects Control Panel.

section.description: For more information on how to get an API key visit "[Getting a Google Maps Javascript API Key]".

link.link: getting a google maps javascript api key

links.link: Getting a Google Maps Javascript API Key
